verses.name: Matthew 26:1
verses.text: And it came to pass, when Jesus had finished all these sayings, he said unto his disciples,

verses.name: Matthew 26:2
verses.text: Ye know that after two days is the feast of the passover, and the Son of man is betrayed to be crucified.

verses.name: Matthew 26:3
verses.text: Then assembled together the chief priests, and the scribes, and the elders of the people, unto the palace of the high priest, who was called Caiaphas,

verses.name: Matthew 26:4
verses.text: And consulted that they might take Jesus by subtilty, and kill him.

verses.name: Matthew 26:5
verses.text: But they said, Not on the feast day, lest there be an uproar among the people.
